item.title: Encryption keys
item.description: PGP I have a PGP key that I use to sign commits, emails and other stuff. pub brainpoolP512r1 2022-02-15 [SCA] [expires: 2025-02-15] 571A3704C842EB6682EA8C66919968CC0C3EA7A4 uid [ultimate] Oklomsy <oklomsy@oklomsy.com> It can be downloaded here or you can use the following command in GPG: gpg --fetch-keys https://oklomsy.com/mainpublic.asc OMEMO I don’t know how to use OMEMO, please don’t use it.
